titleInfo.title: Invitation to the Annual Spring Concert, 1957

mods.abstract: The Brothers invited parents and friends of Christian Brothers College to CBC and St. Agnes' annual Spring Concert, entitled "Music and You," which would trace the evolution of music over time.
